creator: ps@nomensa.com
text:
Right click in the body of a document being edited using Kupu.
Select "Create image"
The popup is a document not found error with the text
" The requested document '/kupupopups/image.html' with document-id
'/kupupopups/image' does not exist."

Created attachment 18195
Fixes broken links for image/links

Changed line 535 and 722 of kupubasetools.js

Instead of reading: kupupopups/image.html it should read;
/kupu/common/kupupopups/image.html

respectively
creator: keven@4thwallmedia.com
